welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Huizucar, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Salvador International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Secondary Terminal
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at El Salvador International Airport is used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
